rules_text:
Indestructible
As long as your party isn’t full, Hel, Keeper of Dishonored isn’t a creature. [i](Your party consists of up to one of each of Cleric, Rogue, Warrior, and Wizard.)[/i]
Cards can’t leave graveyards.
{1}{B}, Sacrifice a creature: Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn.
